sentences.english: His body was buried in snow, but his head was sticking out.
sentences.chinese: 他的身体被大雪掩埋，但是头部还露在外面。

sentences.english: Heaps of debris buried roads and houses.
sentences.chinese: 堆积物掩埋了道路和房屋。

sentences.english: Incineration cannot , of course , eliminate landfilling .
sentences.chinese: 焚化当然不可能避免掩埋。

sentences.english: Next morning the spring flowers were all hidden under deep snow.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早晨春天的花儿都被厚厚的雪掩埋了。

sentences.english: Photos on the popular Weibo microblogging service showed backhoes burying the wrecked train near the site.
sentences.chinese: 围脖上的照片显示挖土地就地掩埋列车残骸。
沙暴掩埋掉了他的脚印。

sentences.english: Have seen before sunset, heard of the tide.
sentences.chinese: 曾经的夕阳，听过的潮落，都被时间掩埋，幻成泡沫。

sentences.english: Procrastination is the best way to bury your potential.
sentences.chinese: 推延是掩埋您庶獗能最佳的体例。

sentences.english: He remembered the unburied dead he had seen in the war.
sentences.chinese: 他想起了他曾在战争中见过那些没有掩埋的尸体。

sentences.english: The German tanks lay buried in the heavy snowbanks.
sentences.chinese: 德国人的坦克掩埋在深深的雪堆中。

sentences.english: Engrave flying snow, all events that being covered in silence, repose temporally.
sentences.chinese: 铭记飞雪，一切被无声掩埋的事物，暂时休憩。

sentences.english: In all the vision of a better, and I was forced to bury sadness.
sentences.chinese: 在所有人都神驰美好时，而我却在强行掩埋哀思。

sentences.english: The violent winds buried the village in sand.
sentences.chinese: 狂风把村子掩埋在沙中。

sentences.english: Repairing bridges and roads counted three white beans and burying human bones two.
sentences.chinese: 修桥补路放三颗白豆，掩埋尸骨放两颗。

sentences.english: Heads were sheared off. One thousand children were trapped in a middle school collapse.
sentences.chinese: 1000个学生被掩埋在坍塌的中学教学楼里。

definition: to dig into/to cut a mine into
to bury/to submerge/to pass into oblivion/to obliterate/to annihilate (physics)
loess (yellow sandy soil typical of north China)
